projects.name: Find Me a Job
projects.shortDescription: Job aggregator with daily email alerts for matching jobs and improved search

projects.name: Trivia Game
projects.description: Test your trivia knowledge using the Trivia Quiz. Built this to learn clojure. Leverages the Open Trivia DB for trivia questions.
projects.shortDescription: Test your trivia knowledge using this Trivia Game. New questions every time!

articles.title: How to make it bigs
articles.content: Must go faster... go, go, go, go, go! Yeah, but your scientists were so preoccupied with whether or not they could, they didn't stop to think if they should. I was part of something special. Must go faster. They're using our own satellites against us. And the clock is ticking.
